input_text:
Job Title: Executive Account Leader

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Overview

Job Purpose

ICE Mortgage Technology is the leading cloud-based platform provider for the mortgage finance industry. ICE Mortgage Technology solutions enable lenders to originate more loans, reduce origination costs, and reduce the time to close, all while ensuring the highest levels of compliance, quality and efficiency.

As an Executive Account Leader, you will develop and maintain strategic long-term trusting relationships with the company’s largest and most strategic clients and prospects to accomplish organic growth and long-term company objectives. The EAL leads with a customer orientation, grounded in the customer’s objectives and business and driven by a strong desire to help customers make their business successful. The EAL role leads a cross-functional account team to assess and fulfill client needs and is ultimately accountable for the health and expansion of the overall customer relationship.

Responsibilities

Builds and sustains trustworthy and personal relationships at all levels of the customer organization and across ICE Mortgage TechnologySuccessfully manages a complex web of relationships and champions the overall customer strategy for positive enterprise business outcomes that solidify long term strategic partnershipsNurtures and cultivates relationships with strategic accounts to transform the relationship and solidify an understanding that ICE Mortgage Technology is an essential strategic partner for any mortgage lenderExecutes collaborative strategic planning meetings in conjunction with customers to ensure alignment in priorities and objectivesStrong in-depth knowledge about competitors and the ability to analyze the additional services and products that could deliver more value to the customerEffectively analyzes company capabilities against the customer to determine fit and opportunities, and “solutions” of products and services that meet customer-defined valueUp-to-date knowledge about your customers and determination to work with Product to deliver features that will provide significant value to themLeads cross-functional teams between customer and internal organizations to execute plans and solution opportunities that align with mutually beneficial long term strategies. Adds new dimensions to the customer relationship by creatively drawing on the full resources of the companyLeads the internal account team in account planning, jointly creating team goals and KPIs to ensure the extended account team is well positioned to achieve their individual goals through the actions of the teamEngages in effective team selling techniques, partnering with extended account team specialists to orchestrate a successful sales processAdheres to a formal sales process while successfully navigating customer buying processes and procurement teams; maintains good pipeline hygieneAchieves annual revenue and growth objectives, including net new business, expansion business, professional services business, and successful renewal goals. Effectively partners with technical support resources to optimize customer technical environments to ensure customer scalability and to mitigate latencyEscalation point for clients on business related issues/concernsEnsures clients are optimizing their investments, benefiting from expansive resources available to support adoption and utilization of what they own to increase their ROI and to support retention efforts.Curates referenceable customers across a wide spectrum of solutions.Builds and maintains customer profile and account information in SalesforceExecutes within the parameters of ICE Mortgage Technology legal, financial, operational and data security requirements

Knowledge And Experience

Exceptional consultative selling and closing skills with experience closing business with large and enterprise organizations essential. Experience executing land and expand strategy preferable.Consumer Finance or Mortgage Industry domain expertise essentialBackground in SAAS desiredExperience with Encompass and/or other mortgage lending origination systems a plusExecutive presence & credibility essentialSkilled in complex, long sales cycle value-based sellingStrong business acumen and the willingness to learn and become an expert in the customer’s business and their strategic business needsExcellent relationship management skillsAdept at building value propositions specific to the customer’s needs and desired outcomeStrong communicator, excellent verbal, written and presentation skillsEffectively articulates a value propositionDelivers Boardroom level presentationsPlans and facilitates highly effective meetings, ensuring all objectives are met with minimal wasted effortPersuasively promotes company ideas (e.g. with enthusiasm, conviction and assertiveness)Provides compelling rationales for arguments (e.g. shows how our positions address key organizational needs and priorities)Builds a broad base of support among key decision-makers and influencers (e.g. links our proposals to their needs, interests and concerns)Mature negotiation skillsAbility to motivate and lead a cross-functional teamAbility to influence stakeholders and marshal resources to deliver on customer expectationsAbility to toggle between strategy and tactics effectivelyStrong strategic and critical thinking skillsEffectively navigates business and technical audiences to nurture opportunitiesDemonstrates a technical aptitude, embraces new technologySolid analytical capabilities, comfortable navigating business intelligence tools to drive analysis and insights

Schedule

This role is remote, and the employee may be located in one of the following states: Arizona, Connecticut, Washington DC, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Kansas, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, New Hampshire, New Jersey, North Carolina, Ohio, Oklahoma, Oregon, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Texas, Utah, Virginia, Wisconsin

Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin or ancestry, age, disability or veteran status, or other protected status.

Experience Level (if available): None

Analyze company capabilities against customer needs

Achieve annual revenue and growth objectives
